#summary Meteoclimatic Gadget.
#labels Featured,Meteoclimatic,Description

= Description =
This gadget provides you with a Personal Weather Station updated data from [http://www.meteoclimatic.com Meteoclimatic] web site.

http://pwsgadgets.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/screenshots/Meteoclimatic/CurrentTab.jpg

To add this gadget to your iGoogle click the button [http://fusion.google.com/add?source=atgs&moduleurl=http%3A//pwsgadgets.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/pws_Meteoclimatic.xml http://gmodules.com/ig/images/plus_google.gif]

= Features =
 * Provide any Meteoclimatic Personal Weather Station id.
 * Show temperature, humidity, wind speed and direction, pressure, rain and last refresh time.

= Tabs =
 * *Current*: Current weather conditions at your personal weather station location.
 * *Extreme*: Today's extreme data.
 * *About*: Info tab containg my email address.

= Configuration Parameters =
In this gadget you can find the following configuration parameters :
  * *Meteoclimatic id*: To get your Meteoclimatic weather station ID you need to add and configure a personal weather station at the [http://www.meteoclimatic.com Meteoclimatic] web site.
    * This parameter is mandatory.
    * Example value: ESIBA0700000107193A.
